business.headline: Infosys agrees to pay $17.5 million to settle lawsuits over US cyber incidentInfosys first disclosed the cyber incident in a stock exchange filing in November 2023. The company said it was working with a cybersecurity products provider to resolve the issue and had launched an independent investigation to assess its impact.

Mutual fund inflows at 10-month low: Here are 3 alternate investment optionsThe total assets under management (AUM) of the mutual fund industry fell 4%, from Rs 66.98 lakh crore in January to Rs 64.26 lakh crore in February.
